ComicInfo.Title: The Salvation Run!
ComicInfo.Summary:
Under trial by the Challenger, Johnny Blaze is forced to relive the worst moments of his life. Death's Head comes a knocking for Karen Page.
Notes: Features the Hostess Twinkies ad, Spider-Man And The "Twinkie Takers"
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-04-22 10:29:48. [CVDB16416]
ComicInfo.Letterer: Karen Mantlo, Gaspar Saladino, Dan Crespi
ComicInfo.Characters: Angel, Aquarius, Black Widow, Carson Collier Sr., Crash Simpson, Death-Stalker, Friend , Ghost Rider (Blaze), Hellstorm, Hercules, Iceman, Marduk Kurios, Mephisto, Miracle Man, Orb (Shannon), Richard Parker, Roxanne Simpson Blaze, Snake-Dance, Spider-Man, Stunt-Master, Thing, Trapster, Zarathos
